abstract: In a deal that was originally announced in the winter of 2006, National Grid said Monday it had reached an agreement with regulators at the New York State Department of Public Service to close its $7.3 billion takeover of KeySpan.
lead_paragraph: In a deal that was originally announced in the winter of 2006, National Grid said Monday it had reached an agreement with regulators at the New York State Department of Public Service to close its $7.3 billion takeover of KeySpan.

headline.main: National Grid Clears Hurdle to Keyspan Deal
